price: Tumeweka makongwa shingoni mwao, yakawafika videvuni. Kwa hivyo vichwa vyao viko juu tu.
arabic: إِنَّا جَعَلۡنَا فِيٓ أَعۡنَٰقِهِمۡ أَغۡلَٰلٗا فَهِيَ إِلَى ٱلۡأَذۡقَانِ فَهُم مُّقۡمَحُونَ
footnotes: Sisi tumewafanya hao wanao kakamia juu ya ukafiri ni kama walio tiwa minyororo shingoni mwao, ikawafika videvuni mwao. Na mikono yao ikawa imefungwa kwenye vichwa vyao, vikawa vimenyanyuka juu na macho yao yameinama. Basi hawawezi kuvizungusha vichwa vyao wapate kuona.

version.title: Swahili translation - Ali Muhsen Alberwany
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Swahili by Ali Muhsen Alberwany

meta.transliteration: innā jaʿalnā fī aʿnāqihim aghlālan fahiya ilā al-adhqāni fahum muq'maḥūna
